awd_titl_txt: Small Grant for Exploratory Research (SGER):                Proprietary Manufacturing Technology
awd_abstract_narration: The underlying hypothesis of this research is that those firms             that utilize an internal capability to design a major part of their             own manufacturing technology will have competitive advantages that              can be identified and ascribed to this strategy.  The objective of              this research is to investigate and test this hypothesis.  The                  research plan includes field studies of the use of in-house                     capabilities to develop and build new manufacturing technology and              the development and implementation for survey mechanisms to serve               as benchmarks for the United States' performance in this area.                      The project is an exploratory step toward a full-scale                      cooperative research program that will study the concept of                     proprietary process technology design and manufacturing in the                  United States, Europe and Japan.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
